description: Generate a session token to connect to a managed endpoint.

parameters.name: endpointIdentifier
parameters.description: The ARN of the managed endpoint for which the request is submitted.

parameters.name: virtualClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The ARN of the Virtual Cluster which the Managed Endpoint belongs to.

parameters.name: executionRoleArn
parameters.description: The IAM Execution Role ARN that will be used by the job run.

parameters.name: credentialType
parameters.description: Type of the token requested. Currently supported and default value of this field is 'TOKEN.'

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The client idempotency token of the job run request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the session token returned.

nested_items.name: credentials
nested_items.description: The structure containing the session credentials.

nested_items.name: token
nested_items.description: The actual session token being returned.

nested_items.name: expiresAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the session token will expire.
